resources.string: Different frequencies can be used for different applications. Increasing the intensity will result in a greater electromagnetic field being experienced.

Pulsed Electromagnetic Field (PEMF) therapy utilizes a wire coil in conjunction with a frequency generator to create a pulsed electromagnetic field. PEMF has been shown to reduce pain, increase bone healing, and also to treat depression.
Increasing the frequency will result in the muscle contractions being felt more frequently, while decreasing the frequency will produce the opposite result.

Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation (TENS) is the use of electrical current for nerve excitation. This non-invasive stimulation has been shown to reduce pain (both chronic and acute) by \"massaging\" the affected area.

AZWeartech is a research and technology center developed under the Fulton Schools of Engineering at Arizona State University. AZWeartech will provide a proof of concept for the Partnership for Economic Innovation (PEI) regarding an industry-led investment strategy and increased public funding for higher education.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
